author: Aristos Georgiou
title: Risk of Virus Spillover From Animals to Humans Increases Through Wildlife Exploitation and Domestication
description: "Exploitation of wildlife, through hunting, capture, and the wildlife trade, typically involves very close contact that facilitates disease transmission," said researcher Christine Johnson.
content:
Animal domestication and human exploitation of wildlifevia hunting, trade, habitat degradation and urbanizationis increasing the risk of animal viruses being transmitted to humans, a team of scientists has said.
